timeline.message:
Handle incorrect header values

When Accept or Content-Type header values are incorrect, a request
should be gracefully rejected and an exception message returned to a
client.

relates https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/64689

timeline.bodyText: Is there anywhere that we can assert that the header name at fault is included in the error sent back to the user ?
timeline.author: jakelandis
